settings.title: Ordering
How does the ordering process work?
settings.answer: There are two ways to order delicious, chef-prepared meals through Table & Twine. With our subscription model, you can customize your weekly meal kit by selecting from rotating entrées, bistro lunches, and delectable pairings. This model affords free delivery as well as savory discounts. But, if you prefer more flexibility, you don’t have to subscribe. Instead, you  can always order items à la carte.

settings.title: How does à la carte ordering work?
settings.answer:
For Charlotte customers, à la carte meals must be ordered by 11:59pm the night before your desired pick-up/delivery date.

For Charleston customers, à la carte meals must be ordered by 11:59pm two days before your desired pick-up/delivery date.

For Raleigh and the Triangle customers, à la carte meals must be ordered by 11:59pm two days before your desired delivery date. Get started by ordering your meal in Charlotte, Raleigh, and Charleston.

settings.title: How does subscription ordering work?
settings.answer: Our subscription model ensures that you get all the tasty Table & Twine meals you crave at an affordable price. Even better, our talented chefs will make weekly meal recommendations based on your preferences. You can either accept their recommendations or make changes to your meal kit. You have until Sunday at 11:59pm the week of delivery or pick-up to modify your order. Get started by signing up for a subscription in Charlotte, Raleigh, and Charleston.

settings.title: What is your cancellation policy?
settings.answer:
Charlotte customers must cancel orders no less than 24 hours before their scheduled delivery/pick-up time to receive a full refund with a 10% cancellation fee. If you cancel your order less than 24 hours before your scheduled delivery/pick-up time, no refund will be offered.

Charleston and Raleigh/The Triangle customers must cancel orders no less than 48 hours before their scheduled delivery/pick-up time to receive a full refund with a 10% cancellation fee. If you cancel your order less than 48 hours before your scheduled delivery/pick-up time, no refund will be offered.

To limit food waste, we will happily deliver your meal to a friend, neighbor, or co-worker who can accept the order in your absence.

settings.title: Can I place an order over the phone?
settings.answer: All orders must be placed online through our website. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at info@tableandtwine.com or by phone.

settings.title: Do you offer substitutions or changes to meals?
settings.answer: At this time, we are not able to accommodate substitutions or changes to meals.

settings.title: What is the order cutoff time?
settings.answer:
For Charlotte customers, meals must be ordered by 11:59pm the night before your desired pick-up/delivery date. Order by Monday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Tuesday. Order by Tuesday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Wednesday. Order by Wednesday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Thursday. Order by Thursday at 11:59pm to receive your meals on Friday.

For Charleston and Raleigh Area customers, meals must be ordered by 11:59pm two days before your desired pick-up/delivery date. Order by Sunday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Tuesday. Order by Tuesday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Thursday.

settings.title: How far in advance can I order?
settings.answer: Menus are available up to seven days in advance.

settings.title: I have a discount code or gift card. How do I use it?
settings.answer: You can use your discount code or gift card at checkout by simply typing the code or link you received into the “Gift or Discount Code” box and clicking “Apply.”

settings.title: What is your refund policy?
settings.answer: We do not offer refunds for orders after the order cut-off time.

settings.title: Meal Kits
When are new menu items offered?
settings.answer: Every season we offer an updated set of new meal experiences, cocktail mixes, appetizers, and desserts while maintaining select favorites that our customers love. We also offer new dinner meals weekly.

settings.title: What if my household avoids specific foods?
settings.answer: Our website displays icons marking which meals are gluten-free, dairy-free, and nut-free.

settings.title: Do you offer specific plans for vegetarians or other dietary options?
settings.answer: Yes, we have a variety of vegetairan meal options as well other diety restrictions.

settings.title: How will my food stay cold?
settings.answer: Our meals are delivered to your door in insulated packaging with gel ice packs to ensure freshness.

settings.title: How do I prepare the meals?
settings.answer: Our individual meals are designed to be prepared in 15 minutes or less. Each meal has comprehensive heating instructions that will guide you through the preparation process.

settings.title: What’s included in the price?
settings.answer: Each price listed for meals is for portions for 1, 2, or 4 adults. Bistro items are designed to feed one adult. Each kids’ meal will feed one child. Family meals, cocktail mixes, desserts, appetizers, and snacks have varying serving sizes that can be found in the product description.

settings.title: How long do meals keep?
settings.answer:
Our prepared dinner meals, summer seasonal offerings, and kids’ meals keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated.

Bistro salads keep for up to 3 days.

Desserts keep for 3 days. Frozen take and bake cookies keep for up to 1 month.

Buffalo chicken dip, jumbo lump crab dip, and roasted red pepper hummus with vegetables keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated.

Local cheese and charcuterie, cheese and fruit plate, and guacamole and corn tortilla chips keep for 3 days refrigerated.

Energy bites keep for 5 days refrigerated, or up to 2 months frozen. Egg cups keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated. Smoothies keep for up to 1 month frozen.

Drink mixes keep for 5 to 7 days refrigerated.

settings.title: Delivery
Is there a delivery fee?
settings.answer: Yes, delivery fees range from $6.99 to $13.99 depending on your location.

settings.title: What areas do you deliver to?
settings.answer: We currently deliver to most locations in Charlotte, Raleigh, and Charleston. Type your zip code in the bar at the top of the page to see if we deliver to your area.

settings.title: How often does delivery or pick-up occur?
settings.answer:
For Charlotte customers, we currently offer delivery and pick-up on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays. Meals can be picked up from 10am to 5:30pm. Our meals are delivered to your front porch between 10:00am and 5:30pm.

For Raleigh and The Traingle customers, we currently only offer delivery on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Our meals are delivered to your home between 12pm and 5:30pm.

For Charleston customers, we offer deliveries on Tuesdays and Thursdays between 12pm and 4pm. Curbside pick-up is available on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 12 pm to 6pm.

settings.title: Is there a minimum order size?
settings.answer:
In Charlotte, we require a minimum order size of $40 for delivery and $25 for pick-up.

In Raleigh and The Triangle, we require a minimum order size of $40 for delivery. 

In Charleston, we require a minimum order size of $30 for both delivery and pick-up.

settings.title: I would like my delivery left somewhere other than my front door (e.g. side door). Can I send specific delivery instructions?
settings.answer: Yes, we will do our best to accommodate alternative delivery needs.

settings.title: What is yourIs there a minimum order size? question?
settings.answer:
In Charlotte and Raleigh, we require a minimum order size of $40 for delivery. In Charlotte, $25 is the minimum for pick-up.

In Charleston, we require a minimum order size of $30 for both delivery and pick-up.Provide the answer to the question here.

settings.title: How is delivery handled if my order contains alcohol?
settings.answer: During the checkout process, you will be prompted to enter your birthdate to complete age verification. All deliveries containing alcohol will require someone age 21 or older to present ID upon arrival. Deliveries containing alcohol cannot be dropped off without ID verification.

settings.title: About Us
How does Table & Twine promote sustainability?
settings.answer:
Recycling & Upcycling

There are some great ways you can upcycle and recycle with Table & Twine:

- Use our insulated tote bags for grocery shopping or to transport food on-the-go

- Place our ice packs in the freezer and use them in lunch boxes and coolers

- Store leftovers in our plastic containers

- We can recycle your tote bags, ice packs, and cleaned plastic containers for you! Just drop them off at our local kitchen or leave them on your doorstep on your delivery day.

Less Food Waste:

At Table & Twine, we pre-portion all of the ingredients needed to make your meal. This significantly cuts down on food waste.

Smart Packaging:

Toreduce our environmental footprint, Table & Twine has eliminated the use of styrofoam. Instead, we use biodegradable products like paper boxes, bamboo trays, and more.

Heating Instructions:

Table & Twine has gone digital! All of our heating instructions can now be found on our website through the use of a QR code on your packaging label. This dramatically reduces our paper consumption.
